projects.name: Chest X-Ray Image Preprocessing for Disease Classification
projects.summary: Co-authored a research study developing a Sobel- and Scharr-based edge detection preprocessing method combined with a shallow CNN to automatically identify and remove low-quality X-ray images. The approach achieved 95% accuracy and improved dataset reliability for disease classification models.
